title: CenturyLink Stock Comes With Strings Attached
text:
CenturyLink stock is higher on Friday, but Guggenheim warns that headwinds remain for the troubled wireline provider.

The back story. CenturyLink stock (ticker: CTL) is down 16% year to date and off 40% in the latest 12 months, making it one of the worst-performing stocks in the S&P 500 in 2019. The company has seen a number of setbacks including executive turnover, delays in regulatory filings, a string of poor earnings, and the consequences of having to reduce its dividend. This comes as the whole wireline industry...
description: Shares of the embattled wireline provider are higher on Friday, but Guggenheim warns that headwinds remain. CenturyLink stock is down 16% year to date and off 40% in the latest 12 months.
